price: nítorí kí (Allāhu) lè san ẹ̀san rere nínú oore àjùlọ Rẹ̀ fún àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí wọ́n sì ṣe iṣẹ́ rere. Dájúdájú (Allāhu) kò nífẹ̀ẹ́ àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti min faḍlihi innahu lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
